originalText.text: HORRIBLE it took 10 days to get my order. I received it at 8:30 pm. Lost 3 days of work from false delivery dates. originalText.text: this store is a big scam , they give you broken furniture and mis match furniture and then they dont want to give you the right one. they pay people to leave them great reviews . they get you the louns and when you dont get the furniture they never close the loan account so that you end up paying it . they ever answer your calls nor text .communication is a negative.

originalText.text:
I am so horrified by this experience I am having with this company. Avoid going to this place at all cost . It is a scam!!!! I wish I would have read the reviews before purchasing anything from this place. Take my WARNING PLEASE DONT END UP LIKE MY WIFE AND I. My wife is 9 months pregnant sleeping on a hard floor for 16 days. Her back hurts and itâ€™s all so unfortunate. Our delivery date was May first. We have not heard from this company since they took our money. The delivery guys are a joke .. they will lie and give you a runaround and then block your phone number.  The sales women will get on the phone and not have a solution. Please do not buy anything from this place. They will rob you !!.

They also called the day of delivery stating they did not have the color furniture we wanted and gave us no choice but to pick another color in one hour. Unprofessional

originalText.text: I was really skeptical because of all the bad reviews but listen u just have to have patience, and understand that this is a small business The customer service may not be top notch you just have to be on them. They made my delivery late in the afternoon but honestly, I wasnâ€™t really stressing too much about it. As long as they delivered my furniture thatâ€™s all I cared about. The delivery guy was telling me the reason why they donâ€™t throw out the trash afterwards itâ€™s because they donâ€™t get paid for it. But best believe I literally just moved into my brand new apartment. I was not allowing them to keep no boxes or plastic in my apartment on my brand new floors. They do speak Spanish, so it might be a language barrier. But trust me, I know Spanish and I told those delivery people to please remove that trash out of my apartment. I understand that theyâ€™re trying to tell me that they donâ€™t get paid for it. OK i get it  but I wasnâ€™t allowing them to leave no trash in my brand new apartment let alone i have a toddler that walks around putting stuff in her mouth I wasnâ€™t having it and they respectfully clean it up. I had a good experience. They also delivered my furniture the next day and I live all the way in Brooklyn
